group_1.textRight: Master, have you decided what you would@like?
Hm?
(She made eye contact, so I thought she was@ready to order.)
If you haven't decided yet, I'll come back.
Take your time.

group_1.textLeft: N-no! Please! I don't want to make you@go back and forth!
U-um...a drink! Please get me a drink!

group_1.textRight: Of course. We have a large selection.
We have juice, coffee, black tea, and we@also have herbal tea, if you'd like.
Here, allow me to show you the menu.
...[wait:1.0][chara:101602:cheek_0][chara:101602:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_200][chara:101602:lipSynch_1]This is the page.

group_1.textLeft: Wow! There are so many kinds!

group_1.textRight: Do you know a lot about tea?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303001:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! I love things like flowers and herbal@tea!

group_1.textRight: Hm, my recommendation...
The Maids' Special Herbal Blend is chosen@quite often.
I'm not an expert, but it is popular.

group_1.textLeft: Oh I see, it's an original blend.

group_1.textRight: As you wish.
Hmm, the master seems rather tense.
But Nagitan is showing her the basics of@manners and customer care.
Yeah.
She's always been a graceful girl, so@she's got the basics down pat.
It was also good she recommended@something the master might like.

group_1.textLeft: Does that mean she passed the first and@second parts of the test?!

group_1.textRight: She will if she keeps this up!@If she keeps it up...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Awesome! She's one step closer to making@it!
